data.name: Cushon Equities Fund
data.description: A diversified fund focused on global equity markets, aiming for long-term growth by investing in a variety of high-performing sectors.

data.name: Green Future Fund
data.description: An eco-friendly investment option targeting renewable energy and sustainable companies to promote environmentally responsible growth.

data.name: Tech Innovations Fund
data.description: Focused on high-growth technology companies, this fund invests in sectors like AI, cloud computing, and cybersecurity.

data.name: Global Bond Fund
data.description: A bond-focused fund aiming to provide steady returns through investment in a balanced mix of international government and corporate bonds.

data.name: Emerging Markets Equity Fund
data.description: This fund targets equities in emerging markets, providing access to high-growth potential regions such as Asia and Latin America.
